mapper.select: select IMH.info_mod_hstr_ordr , IMH.info_mod_hstr_emp_no , to_char(info_mod_hstr_dat, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as "info_mod_hstr_dat" , IMH.info_mod_hstr_col , IMH.info_mod_hstr_befr , IMH.info_mod_hstr_aftr , IMH.info_mod_hstr_mdfr , IMH.info_mod_hstr_resn , EI.emp_info_name as "emp_info_mdfr_name" from info_mod_hstr IMH inner join emp_info EI on (IMH.info_mod_hstr_mdfr = EI.emp_info_emp_no) where info_mod_hstr_emp_no = #{emp_no}
